TopicTitle: The Inferno curseforge thing doesnt work.

Articles.Content: Hello, i'm trying to build a space station too and id like part of it to spin but the inferno robots thing link you gave works but when i get to the curse forge page it says that it doesn't exist anymore, anywhere else i could get it, or another mod like it?
This question has been moved to Add-on Discussion.

5 hours ago, LukeTheLlama55 said:

Hello, i'm trying to build a space station too and id like part of it to spin but the inferno robots thing link you gave works but when i get to the curse forge page it says that it doesn't exist anymore, anywhere else i could get it, or another mod like it?

It sounds like you want a centrifuge for your station. 
SSPXR has some very well made centrifuges that work without robotics. 

Edited November 14, 2021 by Spaceman.Spiff
